description: Occupying a corner of the central Piazza del Popolo in the delightful historic centre of Ruffano, this family restaurant (also a liqueur-maker) is surrounded by old palazzi which add to the charm of its setting. The Puglian cuisine served here has a modern twist while remaining unfussy in style and firmly anchored in the region. The service is quick, and each guest is greeted with a smile by the Rizzo family.
